required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Irlanda-2 Association on the Treatment of Common Cold
clinical_study.official_title: Phase III, National, Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Irlanda-2 Association on the Treatment of Common Cold

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the clinical efficacy of the drug associations in the treatment of common cold

detailed_description.textblock: Double blind,randomized, multicenter; Maximal experiment duration: 7 days; 03 visits; Safety and efficacy evaluation

primary_outcome.measure: Determine efficacy of Irlanda-2-Association in the treatment of common cold symptoms.

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety will be evaluated by the adverse events occurrences

arm_group.description: Take 10 mL every 12 hours (2x/day), oral route.
Take 10 mL every 12 hours (2x/day), oral route.

intervention.description: Take 10 mL every 12 hours (2x/day), oral route.
Take 10 mL every 12 hours (2x/day), oral route.
